com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate

Class ResourceEvaluationStage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate.ResourceEvaluationStage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OfferEvaluationStage

    public class ResourceEvaluationStage
extends java.lang.Object
implements OfferEvaluationStage
    This class evaluates an offer against a given PodInstanceRequirement, ensuring that it contains a sufficient amount or value of the supplied Resource, and creating a ReserveOfferRecommendation or UnreserveOfferRecommendation where necessary.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResourceEvaluationStage(ResourceSpec resourceSpec, java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> taskName, java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> requiredResourceId, java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> resourceNamespace)
      Creates a new instance for basic resource evaluation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EvaluationOutcome evaluate(MesosResourcePool mesosResourcePool, PodInfoBuilder podInfoBuilder)
      Evaluate the given offer (in the form of a MesosResourcePool, modifying the deducting used resources from the pool, and creating the appropriate EvaluationOutcome.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceEvaluationStage

        public ResourceEvaluationStage(ResourceSpec resourceSpec,
                               java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> taskName,
                               java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> requiredResourceId,
                               java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> resourceNamespace)
        Creates a new instance for basic resource evaluation.
        Parameters:
        resourceSpec - the resource spec to be evaluated
        taskName - the name of the task which will use this resource
        requiredResourceId - any previously reserved resource ID to be required, or empty for a new reservation
        resourceNamespace - the namespace label, if any, to store in the resource

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public EvaluationOutcome evaluate(MesosResourcePool mesosResourcePool,
                                  PodInfoBuilder podInfoBuilder)
        Description copied from interface: OfferEvaluationStage
        Evaluate the given offer (in the form of a MesosResourcePool, modifying the deducting used resources from the pool, and creating the appropriate EvaluationOutcome.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface OfferEvaluationStage
        Parameters:
        mesosResourcePool - the available resources left available for this stage to consume
        podInfoBuilder - the grouping of all task and executor builders for the pod
        Returns:
        an EvaluationOutcome describing whether this evaluation stage succeeded or failed, and why
